title: UFC 316 live analysis and results: Dvalishvili vs. O'Malley 2
description: Brett Okamoto, Andreas Hale and Dre Waters break down the action from UFC 316 in Newark, New Jersey.
author: ESPN staff

title: Wright reportedly won't be in mix for Knicks job
description: Former Villanova coach Jay Wright confirmed that he is not interested in the Knicks' head coaching vacancy and wishes to remain retired, according to Seth Davis.

title: 'We lacked seriousness' - Tuchel criticises England 'attitude'
description: Thomas Tuchel criticises England's "attitude" and feels they "played with fire" in a narrow 1-0 World Cup qualifying win away to Andorra.

title: Six games, six wins - but what have England learned?
description: England have started the summer by thrashing a depleted West Indies side - but what does it mean for the team's post-Ashes rebuild and World Cup hopes?

title: Simpson rises from canvas twice to take incredible European title win
description: Callum Simpson rose from the canvas twice to take an incredible European title victory over Ivan Zucco at Oakwell Stadium in his Barnsley hometown.

title: 'Our worst PL finish' - Spurs sack Postecoglou despite Europa glory
description: Tottenham have sacked head coach Ange Postecoglou despite winning the Europa League to end the club's 17-year trophy drought.

title: Ohio State basketball reportedly set to announce home-and-home series with in-state rival
description: According to NCAA basketball insider Jon Rothsten, Ohio State is set to schedule home-and-home series with an in-state traditional basketball power.

title: Pochettino plays down Spurs return rumors
description: USA head coach Mauricio Pochettino has played down rumors linking him with the vacant managerial position at his former club Tottenham Hotspur, following the sacking of Ange Postecoglou on Friday."After I left in 2019, every time that I was free, and the place of the position of the manager or head coach in Tottenham Hotspur (was vacant), my name is appearing on the list," Pochettino said.
